name: [REDACTED]
cardText: Play as a Shield. Re-roll any number of your Hazard Dice.
wikiDescription: [REDACTED] is a [[Crew]] card from the Base Game. They belong to the [[Henko]] faction.

ruleClarifications.description: You cannot re-roll any [[Hazard Dice]] you have gained benefit from.
After being played, [REDACTED] trigger descriptions regarding [[Shield]] cards, including {{objectives/Shield Wall}}.

name: Ada Massa
cardText: +3 Actions. Requirement for Reactor is 1 less.
wikiDescription: Ada Massa is a [[Crew]] card from the Base Game. They belong to the [[Komek]] faction.

name: AT-0K
cardText: Negate 1 Hazard Die. Play as Damage equal to Hazard negated.
wikiDescription: AT-0K is a [[Crew]] card from the Base Game. They belong to the [[Henko]] faction.

ruleClarifications.description: The damage does not trigger descriptions regarding [[Damage]] cards.

[[Damage 1]] and [[Damage 2]] can be "played as" by AT-0K. This is different from other crews like {{crew/Crusse Parke}} (D4), {{crew/Grinar Flok}} (D4), and {{crew/Ryan Rogal}} (D5) where these cards don't exist.

name: B3-AR
cardText: Retrieve a Crew Member from your played or discarded Cards. +1 Action.
wikiDescription: B3-AR is a [[Crew]] card from the Base Game. They belong to the [[Ventus]] faction.

ruleClarifications.description: You have to retrieve a [[Crew]] if available.
All [[IO Spheres]] stacked on a [[Crew]] are discarded when you retrieve it.
B3-AR cannot retrieve itself, even if it is cloned using {{shipParts/The Clone Bay}}.
[TBC] When {{crew/Metaxis}} is using B3-AR's ability, you cannot pick up {{crew/Metaxis}}.

name: Bill Bendo
cardText: Negate 1 Hazard. Requirements for Shield is 1 less. +1 Card or +1 Action.
wikiDescription: Bill Bendo is a [[Crew]] card from the Base Game. They belong to the [[Henko]] faction.

name: Crusse Parke
cardText: Play as Damage 4. Trash the top card from your draw pile.
wikiDescription: Crusse Parke is a [[Crew]] card from the Base Game. They belong to the [[Magnomi]] faction.

ruleClarifications.description: You must trash a card unless there is no card in the draw and discard pile.
[TBC] This does not trigger descriptions regarding [[Damage]] cards, e.g. {{shipParts/MG Warp}} and {{crew/Kary Powalk}}.
[TBC] You cannot play Crusse Parke using {{crew/Zardon the Enforcer}}.

name: Dana Powalki
cardText: Play as a 1 Damage 3, +1 Action.
wikiDescription: Dana Powalki is a [[Crew]] card from the Base Game. They belong to the [[Magnomi]] faction.

name: Kal Damar
cardText: +2 Cards. Optional: Trash 1 Card from your hand.
wikiDescription: Kal Damar is a [[Crew]] card from the Base Game. They belong to the [[Ventus]] faction.

name: Kary Powalk
cardText: All players Damage cards are +1 Damage. +1 Action.
wikiDescription: Kary Powalk is a [[Crew]] card from the Base Game. They belong to the [[Magnomi]] faction.

ruleClarifications.description: The +1 [[Damage]] stacks if this is played again, e.g. with {{shipParts/The Clone Bay}}.
The cards used in Mercenary are not affected, because the mercenary deck is not a player.
This affects all played and to-be-played cards.
This ability affects all [[Damage]] cards but not [[Damage]]. It is also [not] triggered by {{crew/Crusse Parke}} (D4), {{crew/Ryan Rogal}} (D5), {{crew/AT-0K}}.
This ability does not apply to the 2 [[Damage 1]] cards played in {{shipParts/MG2 Laser Turrets}}.

name: Lee van Cribb
cardText: Look at the next 3 Cards in your draw pile, play 1 without an action, discard others. +1 Action.
wikiDescription: Lee van Cribb is a [[Crew]] card from the Base Game. They belong to the [[Komek]] faction.

ruleClarifications.description: If there is no [[Card]] in your draw pile, you may shuffle your discard. If there are no cards in your draw or discard pile, this card only gives [[+1 Action]].

name: Lila al Bindar
cardText: Trash a card from your hand and add a Reactor to your discard pile. +1 Action.
wikiDescription: Lila al Bindar is a [[Crew]] card from the Base Game. They belong to the [[Komek]] faction.

ruleClarifications.description: You may not trash Lila al Bindar.

name: Meg Gallak
cardText: Trash a card from your hand. Subtract 2 from any 1 requirement. +1 Action.
wikiDescription: Meg Gallak is a [[Crew]] card from the Base Game. They belong to the [[Sorelia]] faction.

ruleClarifications.description: You cannot stack this with other abilities that require trashing a card.
If this is played as the last card in your hand, you don't have to trash a card.

name: Moro Mada
cardText: Subtract 2 from any 1 requirement.
wikiDescription: Moro Mada is a [[Crew]] card from the Base Game. They belong to the [[Sorelia]] faction.

ruleClarifications.description: You have to decide which requirement to reduce on play.

name: Myla Dystra
cardText: Discard any number of Cards and draw an equal number. +1 Action.
wikiDescription: Myla Dystra is a [[Crew]] card from the Base Game. They belong to the [[Ventus]] faction.

name: Nella van Daval
cardText: +3 Cards. Requirement for Thruster is 1 less.
wikiDescription: Nella van Daval is a [[Crew]] card from the Base Game. They belong to the [[Ventus]] faction.

name: Ryan Rogal
cardText: +2 Cards. If you draw a Damage, play one without an action as a Damage 5.
wikiDescription: Ryan Rogal is a [[Crew]] card from the Base Game. They belong to the [[Magnomi]] faction.

ruleClarifications.description: The played Damage has to be one of the two Cards you draw.
The played [[Damage]] has to be [[Damage 1/2/3]] and not other cards that can be played as a [[Damage]].

name: Ryle al Wren
cardText: Negate 2 Hazard or reduce Shield requirement by 2.
wikiDescription: Ryle al Wren is a [[Crew]] card from the Base Game. They belong to the [[Henko]] faction.

name: Sella Pelleon
cardText: Subtract 1 from any requirement. +1 Card and +1 Action.
wikiDescription: Sella Pelleon is a [[Crew]] card from the Base Game. They belong to the [[Sorelia]] faction.

ruleClarifications.description: You have to decide which requirement to reduce on play.

name: Tantin al Vale
cardText: Play as a Damage 2 or a Shield.
wikiDescription: Tantin al Vale is a [[Crew]] card from the Base Game. They belong to the [[Magnomi]] faction.

name: Zek Zarag
cardText: Search your draw pile for any Card and play it without an Action. Shuffle your draw pile.
wikiDescription: Zek Zarag is a [[Crew]] card from the Base Game. They belong to the [[Ventus]] faction.

ruleClarifications.description: [Contradiction] If there is no [[Card]] in your draw pile, you may not use this Crew's ability. (This contradicts the ruling on when to replanish draw piles)
You cannot pair this with [[Ship Parts]] requiring an [[Action]] to activate.

name: Col Dervok
cardText: Trash a card from your hand, +3 Credits, +1 Action.
wikiDescription: Col Dervok is a [[Crew]] card from the 1st Encounter micro expansion. They belong to the [[Ventus]] faction.

ruleClarifications.description: If this is played as the last card in your hand, you don't have to trash a card and still gain the benefits.

name: Karma Kesa
cardText: +3 Actions, or draw an Objective Card.
wikiDescription: Karma Kesa is a [[Crew]] card from the 1st Encounter micro expansion. They belong to the [[Komek]] faction.

name: Metaxis
cardText: Use the special ability of any one face up Crew in the Armory.
wikiDescription: Metaxis is a [[Crew]] card from the 1st Encounter micro expansion. They belong to the [[Sorelia]] faction.

ruleClarifications.description: When Metaxis is using {{crew/Prophet}}'s second ability, trash {{crew/Prophet}} from the Armory.
[TBC] When Metaxis is using {{crew/B3-AR}}'s ability, you cannot pick up Metaxis.

name: Strada Rysh
cardText: +1 Prestige, roll an additional Hazard Die, +1 Action.
wikiDescription: Strada Rysh is a [[Crew]] card from the 1st Encounter micro expansion. They belong to the [[Henko]] faction.

ruleClarifications.description: You get the additional [[Prestige]] after the card resolves.
[TBC] If you reach 10 [[Prestige]] (or 15 with alternative rules), you do [not] win until the contract is over and [[Hazard]] is resolved.

name: Zardon the Enforcer
cardText: Play all Damage in your hand without using an Action. +1 Action.
wikiDescription: Zardon the Enforcer is a [[Crew]] card from the 1st Encounter micro expansion. They belong to the [[Magnomi]] faction.

ruleClarifications.description: You can play [[Crews]] that are played as [[Damage]], even if they are not [[Damage]] cards. This includes {{crew/Crusse Parke}}, {{crew/Ryan Rogal}}, {{crew/Grinar Flok}}.

name: Baz
cardText: Play as 1 Damage. If you complete the Contract, block 2 Hazards.
wikiDescription: Baz is a [[Crew]] card from the Shard micro expansion. They belong to the [[Magnomi]] faction.

ruleClarifications.description: The blocked [[Hazards]] count towards {{shipParts/Flare Shard}}.

name: Jes Ofra
cardText: Add a Reactor, Thruster, Shield, or Damage 1 to your hand from the supply.
wikiDescription: Jes Ofra is a [[Crew]] card from the Shard micro expansion. They belong to the [[Sorelia]] faction.

name: Lok Tekt
cardText: Discard any number of Shields from your hand. Then gain +2 Cards for each Shield discarded.
wikiDescription: Lok Tekt is a [[Crew]] card from the Shard micro expansion. They belong to the [[Henko]] faction.

ruleClarifications.description: You may not discard [[Crews]] that are played as a [[Shield]], e.g. {{crew/[REDACTED]}}.

name: Rez Vondu
cardText: +2 Actions or pay 1 Credit for +4 Actions.
wikiDescription: Rez Vondu is a [[Crew]] card from the Shard micro expansion. They belong to the [[Komek]] faction.

name: Sol Forst
cardText: +2 Cards or pay 1 Credit for +4 Cards.
wikiDescription: Sol Forst is a [[Crew]] card from the Shard micro expansion. They belong to the [[Ventus]] faction.

name: Agamar
cardText: Every 2 Damage you play this contract can instead reduce another contract requirement by 1.
wikiDescription: Agamar is a [[Crew]] card from the Endless micro expansion. They belong to the [[Sorelia]] faction.

name: Aponi
cardText: Play as a Reactor, gain +1 Card for every 2 Reactor cards already played, including this one.
wikiDescription: Aponi is a [[Crew]] card from the Endless micro expansion. They belong to the [[Komek]] faction.

name: Belan
cardText: Gain +2 Actions or block 2 Hazard. Reduce a contract requirement by 1.
wikiDescription: Belan is a [[Crew]] card from the Endless micro expansion. They belong to a [[Special]] faction.

name: Isabel
cardText: Trash a card from your hand to gain +3 Cards. You main instead trash the top card of your deck to also negate a Hazard Die.
wikiDescription: Isabel is a [[Crew]] card from the Endless micro expansion. They belong to a [[Special]] faction.

ruleClarifications.description: You may not trash the top [[Card]] if there is no [[Hazard Die]] to negate.

name: Klar
cardText: Draw 2 Objectives. Keep 1 and give 1 to another player. If you have the least Prestige, keep both. +1 Action.
wikiDescription: Klar is a [[Crew]] card from the Endless micro expansion. They belong to a [[Special]] faction.

ruleClarifications.description: [TBC] If you are tied for the least [[Prestige]], the first player in turn order - starting from the Mission Leader - will get the other [[Objective]].

name: Naka
cardText: Play as a Thruster, gain +1 Action for each Thruster card already played, including this one.
wikiDescription: Naka is a [[Crew]] card from the Endless micro expansion. They belong to the [[Ventus]] faction.

name: Namari
cardText: Play as a Shield, gain +1 Card for each Shield card already played, including this one.
wikiDescription: Namari is a [[Crew]] card from the Endless micro expansion. They belong to the [[Henko]] faction.

name: Pentha
cardText: Roll a Hazard Die. Reduce any contract requirement by the number of Hazard rolled on this die. Negate a Hazard Die.
wikiDescription: Pentha is a [[Crew]] card from the Endless micro expansion. They belong to a [[Special]] faction.

name: Prophet
cardText: Gain any action card or trash this card to gain a Prestige.
wikiDescription: Prophet is a [[Crew]] card from the Endless micro expansion. They belong to a [[Special]] faction.

ruleClarifications.description: The card gained goes to discard.
It still counts towards the [[Crew]] requirement if you decided to use the second part of the ability. (You will have to play it to activate its ability, then trash it after play.)

name: Saghari
cardText: Play as a Damage 2, +1 Action for each Damage card already played, including this one.
wikiDescription: Saghari is a [[Crew]] card from the Endless micro expansion. They belong to the [[Magnomi]] faction.

name: Ark Tii
cardText: Gain a Faction Rep with your lowest faction. +1 Action.
wikiDescription: Ark Tii is a [[Crew]] card from the Binding Ties expansion. They belong to the [[Sorelia]] faction.

name: Detra Lar
cardText: +3 Actions. You may trash this card to gain a Faction Rep.
wikiDescription: Detra Lar is a [[Crew]] card from the Binding Ties expansion. They belong to the [[Komek]] faction.

name: Finneal Lee
cardText: You may spend any amount of Faction Rep to gain an equal number of Actions. +1 Action.
wikiDescription: Finneal Lee is a [[Crew]] card from the Binding Ties expansion. They belong to the [[Komek]] faction.

name: Gadra Ga
cardText: Spend any 2 Faction Rep to deal 4 Damage.
wikiDescription: Gadra Ga is a [[Crew]] card from the Binding Ties expansion. They belong to the [[Magnomi]] faction.

ruleClarifications.description: This action is mandatory.

name: Kinta Lar
cardText: +3 Cards. You may trash this card to gain a Faction Rep.
wikiDescription: Kinta Lar is a [[Crew]] card from the Binding Ties expansion. They belong to the [[Ventus]] faction.

name: Kyas IV
cardText: Play as a Damage 2. You may trash the top card of your draw pile to gain 2 Faction Rep.
wikiDescription: Kyas IV is a [[Crew]] card from the Binding Ties expansion. They belong to the [[Magnomi]] faction.

name: Linus Farno
cardText: Play as a Shield. You may spend 1 of your Faction Rep to gain 1 Faction Rep of any color.
wikiDescription: Linus Farno is a [[Crew]] card from the Binding Ties expansion. They belong to the [[Henko]] faction.

name: Lynna Tragel
cardText: Play as a Shield. Roll an additional Hazard Die. +1 Faction Rep.
wikiDescription: Lynna Tragel is a [[Crew]] card from the Binding Ties expansion. They belong to the [[Henko]] faction.

name: Taygar Tak
cardText: Spend 1 Faction Reputation to subtract any 1 requirement.
wikiDescription: Taygar Tak is a [[Crew]] card from the Binding Ties expansion. They belong to the [[Sorelia]] faction.

ruleClarifications.description: This action is mandatory.

name: The Warden
cardText: +2 Cards. +1 Faction Rep. All other players gain 1 Faction Rep in their Faction with the least Rep.
wikiDescription: The Warden is a [[Crew]] card from the Binding Ties expansion. They belong to the [[Ventus]] faction.

name: Anka Kramer
cardText: +4 Cards. Discard 3 cards.
wikiDescription: Anka Kramer is a [[Crew]] card from the Overload expansion. They belong to the [[Ventus]] faction.

name: Armitage
cardText: Play as a Shield and +1 Action, or you may trash this card to subtract 3 Shields from a contract requirement.
wikiDescription: Armitage is a [[Crew]] card from the Overload expansion. They belong to the [[Henko]] faction.

name: Dae Arum
cardText: Subtract 3 from any 1 requirement. Lose 1 Prestige.
wikiDescription: Dae Arum is a [[Crew]] card from the Overload expansion. They belong to the [[Sorelia]] faction.

name: Domi
cardText: Add or remove 1 [IO] to any of your ship parts. +1 Action.
wikiDescription: Domi is a [[Crew]] card from the Overload expansion. They belong to the [[Komek]] faction.

name: FT-1000
cardText: Subtract 2 from any 1 requirement. Add 1 Miss from the supply to your hand.
wikiDescription: FT-1000 is a [[Crew]] card from the Overload expansion. They belong to the [[Sorelia]] faction.

name: Grinar Flok
cardText: Play as a Damage 4. Roll an additional Hazard Dice.
wikiDescription: Grinar Flok is a [[Crew]] card from the Overload expansion. They belong to the [[Magnomi]] faction.

name: Ha Kun
cardText: +1 Action. Add a Crew that costs 2 Credits or less from the armory to your discard pile.
wikiDescription: Ha Kun is a [[Crew]] card from the Overload expansion. They belong to the [[Sorelia]] faction.

ruleClarifications.description: [Unruled] You must take a [[Crew]] if one is available.
[Unruled] You can only take [[Crews]] that are face-up.

name: IO L1-ON
cardText: Add 3 [IO]. Once per contract, remove 1 [IO] to draw +1 Card. Do not discard until the last [IO] is removed.
wikiDescription: IO L1-ON is a [[Crew]] card from the Overload expansion. They belong to the [[Ventus]] faction.

ruleClarifications.description: You remove [[IO Spheres]] only when you choose to use its ability.

name: IO Mirage
cardText: Add 3 [IO]. Once per contract, remove 1 [IO] to add 1 [IO] to any of your cards. Do not discard until the last [IO] is removed.
wikiDescription: IO Mirage is a [[Crew]] card from the Overload expansion. They belong to the [[Sorelia]] faction.

ruleClarifications.description: You remove [[IO Spheres]] only when you choose to use its ability.

name: IO MK8
cardText: Add 3 [IO]. Once per contract, remove 1 [IO] to gain +1 Action. Do not discard until the last [IO] is removed.
wikiDescription: IO MK8 is a [[Crew]] card from the Overload expansion. They belong to the [[Komek]] faction.

ruleClarifications.description: You remove [[IO Spheres]] only when you choose to use its ability.

name: IO Wraith 3000
cardText: Add 3 [IO]. Once per contract, remove 1 [IO] to block 1 Hazard. Do not discard until the last [IO] is removed.
wikiDescription: IO Wraith 3000 is a [[Crew]] card from the Overload expansion. They belong to the [[Henko]] faction.

ruleClarifications.description: You remove [[IO Spheres]] only when you choose to use its ability.

name: IO-MG21
cardText: Add 3 [IO]. Once per contract, remove 1 [IO] to deal 2 Damage. Do not discard until the last [IO] is removed.
wikiDescription: IO-MG21 is a [[Crew]] card from the Overload expansion. They belong to the [[Magnomi]] faction.

ruleClarifications.description: You remove [[IO Spheres]] only when you choose to use its ability.

name: Ivan Guyril
cardText: Subtract 2 from any 1 requirement. Then, add this card to any other player's discard pile.
wikiDescription: Ivan Guyril is a [[Crew]] card from the Overload expansion. They belong to the [[Sorelia]] faction.

name: Kin Tobor
cardText: Trash a card from your hand, gain 1 Credit.
wikiDescription: Kin Tobor is a [[Crew]] card from the Overload expansion. They belong to the [[Sorelia]] faction.

name: Kurt Bilar
cardText: +2 Actions. If you have played 2 or more Reactor cards, +2 Cards.
wikiDescription: Kurt Bilar is a [[Crew]] card from the Overload expansion. They belong to the [[Komek]] faction.

name: Letyba
cardText: Trash a default loadout card from your hand and replace it with any other version of that type of card.
wikiDescription: Letyba is a [[Crew]] card from the Overload expansion. They belong to the [[Sorelia]] faction.

ruleClarifications.description: The other card goes to your hand.
[TBC] You may trash a [[Miss]] but you would add a [[Miss]] back.

name: Lyantoba Ga
cardText: Block 3 Hazard. Then, add this card to any other player's discard pile.
wikiDescription: Lyantoba Ga is a [[Crew]] card from the Overload expansion. They belong to the [[Henko]] faction.

name: Miska Rose
cardText: Subtract 1 additional Crew requirement. +1 Action.
wikiDescription: Miska Rose is a [[Crew]] card from the Overload expansion. They belong to the [[Sorelia]] faction.

name: Oleg Ali
cardText: +3 cards. All players not on the contract draw +1 Card.
wikiDescription: Oleg Ali is a [[Crew]] card from the Overload expansion. They belong to the [[Ventus]] faction.

name: Pat Nungar
cardText: Choose 2: +1 Action, +1 Card, Block 1 Hazard, Trash a card from your hand.
wikiDescription: Pat Nungar is a [[Crew]] card from the Overload expansion. They belong to the [[Komek]] faction.

name: Amper
cardText: Roll a die: [[Hazard 0]] Play as a Damage 4. [[Hazard 1]] Play as a Damage 2. [[Hazard 2]] +1 Hazard.
wikiDescription: Amper is a [[Crew]] card from the Starfall expansion. They belong to the [[Magnomi]] faction.

name: Avari
cardText: Roll a die: [[Hazard 0]] Gain a Prestige. [[Hazard 1]] Lose 1 Credit. [[Hazard 2]] Trash this card.
wikiDescription: Avari is a [[Crew]] card from the Starfall expansion. They belong to the [[Sorelia]] faction.

name: Salatar
cardText: Roll a die: [[Hazard 0]] Play as 2 Reactors. [[Hazard 1]] Play as a Reactor. [[Hazard 2]] Lose an Action.
wikiDescription: Salatar is a [[Crew]] card from the Starfall expansion. They belong to the [[Komek]] faction.

name: Thegor
cardText: Roll a die: [[Hazard 0]] Block all of your Hazard. [[Hazard 1]] Play as a Shield. [[Hazard 2]] +1 Hazard.
wikiDescription: Thegor is a [[Crew]] card from the Starfall expansion. They belong to the [[Henko]] faction.

name: Yarcon
cardText: Roll a die: [[Hazard 0]] Play as 2 Thrusters. [[Hazard 1]] Play as a Thruster. [[Hazard 2]] Discard 2 cards.
wikiDescription: Yarcon is a [[Crew]] card from the Starfall expansion. They belong to the [[Ventus]] faction.

name: Dr. Umbrage
cardText: Add a Dark Matter card to your discard pile, or trash a Dark Matter card to deal 6 Damage.
wikiDescription: Dr. Umbrage is a [[Crew]] card from the Dark Matter expansion. They belong to the [[Magnomi]] faction.

name: HAZ3
cardText: Add a Dark Matter card to your discard pile, or trash 1 Dark Matter card to gain 5 Credits.
wikiDescription: HAZ3 is a [[Crew]] card from the Dark Matter expansion. They belong to a [[Special]] faction.

name: Imdar Shade
cardText: Add a Dark Matter card to your discard pile, or trash 1 Dark Matter card to negate all of your Hazard Dice.
wikiDescription: Imdar Shade is a [[Crew]] card from the Dark Matter expansion. They belong to the [[Henko]] faction.

name: Vanta Sae
cardText: Add a Dark Matter card to your discard pile, or trash 2 Dark Matter cards to gain a Prestige.
wikiDescription: Vanta Sae is a [[Crew]] card from the Dark Matter expansion. They belong to the [[Sorelia]] faction.

name: Vila Noir
cardText: Add a Dark Matter card to your discard pile, or trash a Dark Matter card to gain +3 Actions and +3 Cards.
wikiDescription: Vila Noir is a [[Crew]] card from the Dark Matter expansion. They belong to the [[Komek]] faction.

name: AN-D3RS
cardText: Roll 3 [[Moonrollers]] dice. Draw +2 Cards for each [[Thruster]] or [[Wild]]. Discard 2 cards for each [[Extra die]].
wikiDescription: AN-D3RS is a [[Crew]] card from the Intrepid expansion from Moonrollers. They belong to the [[Ventus]] faction.

name: Fortunatus
cardText: All players may roll a [[Moonrollers]] die. Reduce a matching contract requirement by 1. Reduce any requirement by 1 on a [[Wild]] or [[Extra die]].
wikiDescription: Fortunatus is a [[Crew]] card from the Intrepid expansion from Moonrollers. They belong to the [[Sorelia]] faction.

name: Omnitus
cardText: Roll 3 [[Moonrollers]] dice. +2 Actions for each Reactor. +2 Cards for each [[Thruster]]. +1 Card, +1 Action for each [[Wild]].
wikiDescription: Omnitus is a [[Crew]] card from the Intrepid expansion from Moonrollers. They belong to the [[Komek]] faction.

name: Oparia
cardText: Roll 5 [[Moonrollers]] dice. Deal 2 Damage for each [[Damage]]. Gain 1 Hazard for each [[Extra die]]. You may re-roll each dice once.
wikiDescription: Oparia is a [[Crew]] card from the Intrepid expansion from Moonrollers. They belong to the [[Magnomi]] faction.

name: S4-LADCAT
cardText: Roll 4 [[Moonrollers dice]]. Block 1 Hazard for each [[Wild]]. Reduce Shield requirements by 1 for each [[Shield]]. You may re-roll each dice once.
wikiDescription: S4-LADCAT is a [[Crew]] card from the Intrepid expansion from Moonrollers. They belong to the [[Henko]] faction.
